page.title: 04FREE TIME - WYKE'S 9 YR.OLDS
page.content: The children of High Fernley School, Wyke, wrote the following on how they spend their free time:- Most of us watch television every night. Many of us have televisions in our bedrooms, and when we want to get away from everybody we go and watch our own. At weekends, some of our families hire videos and we usually watch them in the mornings. Nearly all of us belong to some sort of club after school. We go to cubs, brownies, gymnastics, swimming and karate. A lot of the boys train and play football with Wyke Wanderers. Some people are learning to play musical instruments. The rest of the time we play around on the streets on our bikes, or play football or cricket. The park is too far away and isn't nice anyway.
